Scottsdale.McCormick Ranch:
McCormick Ranch refers to an area in Scottsdale, Arizona, which is one of the largest planned communities in Arizona.


== History ==
In 1921, the Jolly family built a ranch and home on 160 acres located at what is today the corner of Scottsdale and Indian Bend roads. This was purchased by Merle Cheney in 1942, who not long afterwards sold it to Fowler and Anne McCormick.
